rows.label: qev041103_MSG0001
rows.name:
Pardon, but has friend seen anyone selling red pollen
orbs to Nopon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0002
rows.name:
Eating red pollen orb gives huge spike of warm,
fuzzy-feeling energy! But on comedown, it makes
user lazy. Sooooo veeeery lazy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then they become dead weight for caravan.
It huge nuisance! So annoying![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0004
rows.name:
Rrrrgh! Where IS he?! Always sneaking around,
then skittering off when Loma catch him in sights...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0005
rows.name:
Er, pardon, but has friend seen Nopon here called
Bodada?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev041103_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Loma that you haven't seen him.

rows.label: qev041103_JNK0050
rows.name: Probe

rows.label: qev041103_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask to hear more about Bodada.

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0006
rows.name:
Hmm. Loma see. Well, if friend DOES see him,
please let Loma know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0007
rows.name:
Bodada go around selling red pollen orbs to
everyone he sees. It is serious pain in fuzzy butt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0008
rows.name:
Eating orbs gives huge spike of energy, but on
comedown it make user very lazy. Then they not work
and caravan suffers. Bad news for everybody![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0009
rows.name:
If Loma not catch Bodada, problem will spread.
Too many Nopon lured in by promise of instant
energy boost only to become useless lump.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev041103_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that you know nothing about it.

rows.label: qev041103_JNK0070
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev041103_SEL0071
rows.name:
Say that Zazazan asked you to deliver
a secret shipment to Bodada.

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0039
rows.name: Whaaat?! Loma KNEW those two were connected![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0011
rows.name:
And friend is carrying shipment for them?
Will friend let Loma take look?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_JNK0080
rows.name: Lie

rows.label: qev041103_SEL0081
rows.name: Say that you don't have the shipment on you.

rows.label: qev041103_JNK0090
rows.name: Confess

rows.label: qev041103_SEL0091
rows.name: Admit that you have the shipment.

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0012
rows.name:
...Friend already delivered it to Bodada? Hrmmm.
Loma need to stop Bodada before he start selling it off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0013
rows.name:
WHAT?! Show to Loma! If it contain red pollen orbs,
that is proof Loma need to bring Bodada down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0014
rows.name:
Such color! Such shine!
Now Loma analyze composition...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0015
rows.name:
Hmm... So red! One bite and ZOOOOOOM!
But theeeen CRASH. ...Yup. This is red pollen orb,
all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0016
rows.name:
Loma appreciate cooperation of friend.
This should be enough to bring in lowlifes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0017
rows.name:
Loma will hurry and catch Bodada before he has
chance to flee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0018
rows.name:
Loma managed to catch lowlifes just as they meet up.
Two villains for price of one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0019
rows.name:
Friend betrayed Zazazan? Friend is just as awful as
Harvey! Zazazan done with humans for good![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0020
rows.name:
This human is ally of justice. Awful ones are Zazazan
and Bodada for profiting off red pollen orbs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0021
rows.name:
Once Loma report you to elder, Zazazan and
Bodada never do business here again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0022
rows.name: N-no! Not that! *sniffle*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0023
rows.name:
P-please, anything but that! If Bodada unable to
make money, life lose all purpose![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0040
rows.name:
Friend is sure [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] is not holding goods for Bodada?
Extra special very sure?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0024
rows.name:
Loma only trying to keep fellow Nopon safe.
So if friend knows anything at all, please share.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_JNK0100
rows.name: Lie

rows.label: qev041103_SEL0101
rows.name: Say that you don't have the shipment on you.

rows.label: qev041103_JNK0110
rows.name: Confess

rows.label: qev041103_SEL0111
rows.name: Admit that you have the shipment.

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0025
rows.name:
Loma see. Still, if friend see anything sneaky and
suspicious, please tell Loma right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0026
rows.name: Loma KNEW it! Loma have nose for these things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0027
rows.name:
Show shipment to Loma. If it contain red pollen orbs,
that is proof Loma need to bring Bodada down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0029
rows.name:
Such color! Such shine!
Now Loma analyze composition...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0030
rows.name:
Hmm... So red! One bite and ZOOOOOOM!
But theeeen CRASH. ...Yup. This is red pollen orb,
all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0031
rows.name:

This should be enough to bring in lowlifes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0032
rows.name:

chance to flee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0033
rows.name:

Two villains for price of one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041103_MSG0034
rows.name:

Harvey! Zazazan done with humans for good![ST:wait ]

and Bodada for profiting off red pollen orbs.[ST:wait ]
